title: Lakshmi Devi Pendant - Golden Abundance (Lakshmi Ammavari Taggu)
materials: Accented with High-Quality Cubic Zirconia and Three Ruby Gemstones (0.05 carats).
features: Features a detailed depiction of Goddess Lakshmi seated on a lotus flower. Intricate design captures traditional temple jewelry aesthetics. The Lotus and Goddess are covered with High-Quality Cubic Zirconia to add to the details. Halo is ornamented with white Cubic Zirconia and a Ruby.
colors: with accents of red (ruby) and white (Cubic Zirconia)
evoking a sense of prosperity and purity. Classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: Ideal for auspicious occasions like weddings (Veedukolu)
and religious festivals. Also suitable for daily wear as a symbol of blessings and good fortune.
description: A unique and elegant Lakshmi Devi pendant that combines traditional craftsmanship with modern sensibilities. The intricate detailing, high-quality materials, and symbolic representation make it a cherished heirloom piece. A timeless tribute to the Goddess of Wealth and Prosperity.
